The program `customasm` that you received along with the rest of
this release is a version of the CustomASM utility, pre-compiled
using musl, licensed under Apache-2.0 and with sources available at
https://github.com/hlorenzi/customasm.

Read the accompanying `LICENSE.txt` for CustomASM's full license document.
No modifications to the program have been made prior to compilation.
The program is hereby included solely for the end user's convenience.
